mapper.update: MERGE INTO PERFORMANCE USING DUAL ON (MT20ID = #{mt20id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MT10ID = #{mt10id}, PRFNM = #{prfnm}, PRFPDFROM = #{prfpdfrom}, PRFPDTO = #{prfpdto}, PRFCAST = #{prfcast}, PRFRUNTIME = #{prfruntime}, POSTER = #{poster}, DTGUIDANCE = #{dtguidance}, PCSEGUIDANCE = #{pcseguidance} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PERFORMANCE_NUM, MT10ID, MT20ID, PRFNM, PRFPDFROM, PRFPDTO, PRFCAST, PRFRUNTIME, GENRENM, POSTER, DTGUIDANCE, PCSEGUIDANCE) VALUES (PERFORMANCE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mt10id}, #{mt20id}, #{prfnm}, #{prfpdfrom}, #{prfpdto}, #{prfcast}, #{prfruntime}, #{genrenm}, #{poster}, #{dtguidance}, #{pcseguidance})

MERGE INTO PERFORMANCE_PLACE USING DUAL ON (MT10ID = #{mt10id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET FCLTYNM = #{fcltynm}, ADRES = #{adres}, LA = #{la}, LO = #{lo}, TELNO = #{telno} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (MT10ID,FCLTYNM, ADRES, LA, LO, TELNO) VALUES (#{mt10id}, #{fcltynm}, #{adres}, #{la}, #{lo}, #{telno})
